name: Ninja Othello
description:
Ninja Othello is a free Othello game on ios!
ninja Othello involving strategy and played by two players on a board with 8 rows and 8 columns and a set of distinct pieces for each side.
The player's goal is to have a majority of their colored pieces showing at the end of the game, turning over as many of their opponent's pieces as possible.
With this ninja Othello, you can play with a friend who sits next to you or play against your phone.
As ever, designed with the polish of a standard AI Factory product.
Will you be able to beat the most difficult ninja Othello level designed ?

Featuring:
- User friendly interface
- 7 difficulty levels, plus hints
- 2 player hot-seat
- Designed for both Tablet and Phone

Let's play ninja Othello!
